@pixi-essentials/svg > SVGImageNode

SVGImageNode 

class SVGImageNode extends SVGGraphicsNode

Draws SVG <image /> elements.

Protected Properties

_canvas SVGImageNode.ts:14 
protected _canvas: HTMLCanvasElement

The canvas used into which the SVGImageElement is drawn. This is because WebGL does not support using SVGImageElement as an ImageSource for textures.

_context SVGImageNode.ts:20 
protected _context: CanvasRenderingContext2D

The Canvas 2D context for this._canvas.

_texture SVGImageNode.ts:25 
protected _texture: PIXI.Texture

A texture backed by this._canvas.
